column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were not satisfied with this place. My fried chicken could have been cooked better. I would say five more minutes would have it tasting kind of rubbery in certain bites. The mash potatoes were the best part of my meal. My coworker got a filet mignon and it was really dry
column2: they must have let it rest too long. Though they issue her another one
column3: the satisfaction of the meal was gone. The second one was okay
column4: she ate it as not to offend anyone. The staff was cool. I'm giving this place 2 stars
column5: because the bread was so good
column7: the staff was friendly and the ambience of the place.
